name: Tag, You're It! Online Quiz | Movie Taglines | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Miss Congeniality.

	'Miss Congeniality' is a 2000 blockbuster about an FBI agent that goes undercover in a beauty pageant. Michael Caine, Sandra Bullock and Ben Bratt star in this comedic hit.

Bad Boys.

	'Bad Boys' is about two police officers who get caught up in more than a drug case after a witness to a murder comes forward. Will Smith and Martin Lawrence star in this 1995 blockbuster.

Terminator 3.

	A female terminator comes for John Connor in 'Terminator 3'. Arnold Schwarzenegger and Kristanna Loken star in this 2003 movie.

Scream.

	'Scream' is a 1996 blockbuster film about the deaths of several teenagers caused by a man in a black robe and mask. Neve Campbell and David Arquette star in this movie that sets the stage for two sequels.

Scary Movie.

	'Scary Movie' is a comedic movie that came out in the year 2000, covering a collection of scary movies from 'Scream' to 'Urban Legends'. It stars the Wayans brothers and Carmen Electra. Three sequels have come from this movie.

questions.text: 'The sport made him a legend. His heart made him a hero.'
questions.explanation:
8 Seconds.

	The movie '8 Seconds' came out in 1994 and stars Luke Perry, Stephen Baldwin and Red Mitchell. It is the true story of 1987 RCA rodeo champion Lane Frost.

questions.text: 'Sometimes what you're looking for is right where you left it.'
questions.explanation:
Sweet Home Alabama.

	'Sweet Home Alabama' is a 2002 blockbuster film about a novice fashion designer who returns home to get a divorce from her husband so she can marry another man. 'Sweet Home Alabama' stars Reese Witherspoon, Patrick Dempsey, Candice Bergen and Josh Lucas.

Runaway Bride.

	The 1999 hit 'Runaway Bride' stars Julia Roberts as a third time bride-to-be who can't seem to make it to the altar. Richard Gere and Joan Cusack also star in this movie.

Undercover Blues.

	'Undercover Blues' is a 1993 movie starring Dennis Quaid as an agent who tries to save the world while vacationing with his agent wife and their new baby in New Orleans. Tom Arnold, Park Overall and Stanley Tucci provide more comedic moments for the couple.

questions.text: 'A story about love at second sight.'
questions.explanation:
While You Were Sleeping.

	'While You Were Sleeping' is a blockbuster movie that came out in 1993 and stars Sandra Bullock as a Chicago woman who falls in love with the brother of a man in a coma.  Bill Pullman and Peter Gallagher co-star in the movie. It is my favorite romantic comedy!
